allow: Bash(for file in SiteSettings.tsx ContactInfo.tsx Banners.tsx Gallery.tsx Testimonials.tsx Regions.tsx Faq.tsx)
Bash(for file in Dashboard.tsx SiteSettings.tsx ContactInfo.tsx Banners.tsx Gallery.tsx Testimonials.tsx Regions.tsx Faq.tsx SeasonalCalendar.tsx)
Bash(for file in Banners.tsx ContactInfo.tsx Faq.tsx Gallery.tsx LooseItems.tsx Regions.tsx SeasonalCalendar.tsx ComparativeTable.tsx Testimonials.tsx Baskets.tsx)
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/seasonal-calendar > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done')
Bash(timeout 8 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/seasonal-calendar > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done')
Bash(for file in ContactInfo Banners Gallery Testimonials Regions Faq SeasonalCalendar ComparativeTable LooseItems Baskets Duvidas Scripts Pedidos)
Bash(for file in Testimonials Regions Faq SeasonalCalendar ComparativeTable LooseItems Baskets Duvidas Scripts Pedidos)
Bash(for page in Regions Faq SeasonalCalendar ComparativeTable LooseItems Baskets Duvidas Scripts Pedidos Testimonials)
Bash(for file in Faq.tsx SeasonalCalendar.tsx Pedidos.tsx Scripts.tsx)
